Home → Events activities → Children’s activities

Children’s activities

Activities, events and clubs for pre-school and school age children.

Pre-school children

Free, fun sessions for babies, toddlers and young children. Have fun, meet other parents and carers and give your child a great start in life.

Find an activity near you →

School age children

Lego, Minecraft and coding clubs, reading & writing groups, craft sessions and more for school age children.

Find an event near you →
